price: Yeroo isaan kafaran shira sirratti baasan [yaadadhu], si hidhuuf yookiin si ajjeesuf yookiin (biyya irraa) si baasuuf. Isaan shira baasu; Rabbiinis shira baasa (shira isaanii isaan irratti deebisa), Rabbiin irra caalaa warra tooftaa baasuuti.
arabic: وَإِذۡ يَمۡكُرُ بِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُواْ لِيُثۡبِتُوكَ أَوۡ يَقۡتُلُوكَ أَوۡ يُخۡرِجُوكَۚ وَيَمۡكُرُونَ وَيَمۡكُرُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَٱللَّهُ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡمَٰكِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh yamkuru bika alladhīna kafarū liyuth'bitūka aw yaqtulūka aw yukh'rijūka wayamkurūna wayamkuru al-lahu wal-lahu khayru al-mākirīna
